column4: they don't have sounds on gnome-look.org? or just graphics stuff?
it means you can write !hardy in the channel and ubottu will tell you about it
good link when you're in doubt =)
if you have a server you want to use.. and just keep running.. you don't want it to update gnome versions or something like that.. you just want it to run
You mean because the bugs have been ironed out already?  Doesn't that apply to any old stable release? And is there any lack of support for Jaunty?
not really.. but because they stick to one version for a longer time
so you make sure your apps work with what the LTS version offers and then you know that the same app will keep working for the next 5 years.. that makes you sleep better at night =)
you can google for "port 31416", there are several sites that offer port listings with info on daemons and such

oh.. it still applies though.. take gnea with you to #ubuntu+1 =)
